about:
I am a backend developer with experience in developing applications and services using Node.js. A passion for technology and the ability to self-study are the main factors that motivated me in my programming career.


With experience working in the field of programming and developing applications and services using Node.js, participating in projects, actively contributing to the development of web applications and systems, building The application uses Node.js as the backend, using Express.js and other frameworks to build powerful APIs. I have developed small and medium-sized projects with many skills training in the field of data crawling and API development for the myForex project, hoping to bring a lot of real value to the project.
